trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> 类的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate to both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> events, and adds the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>，将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler>委托<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，并将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>通过控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, formats the bound value (a <xref:System.Decimal> type) as currency using the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `DecimalToCurrencyString`事件委托，添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件，设置绑定的值的格式 (<xref:System.Decimal>类型) 作为货币使用<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the <xref:System.Decimal> type.
trans-unit.target: `CurrencyStringToDecimal`事件委托，添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>事件，将由控件显示的值转换回<xref:System.Decimal>类型。
